resources.string: The app needs to access file storage to store dictionary data.

Hello! This app is designed for people who speak endangered or at risk languages and need a digital dictionary for reference. Since there are so many languages out there in the world that need digital dictionaries, we have created one massive mega dictionary that will contain all these individual dictionaries. That's why we're calling this "The Blank Dictionary". 

 	 To switch between a dictionary, just toggle between dictionaries in the settings. We also have a website at www.blank-dictionary.herokuapp.com that functions like this mobile app. (The website may take a couple seconds to load if it hasn't been used for awhile). 

 	 If this sounds good to you, please consider supporting us. This project was never intended to be controlled by one person. We need your help to create content and if possible, your donations. We currently have no funding and are looking for different ways to sustain this project (There is only one person developing the software). 

 	 If you would like to contribute content to a language already listed in here, or if you want to create a new dictionary for another language, feel free to email 88developers@gmail.com to get started. 

 	 If something isn't working or if you have any other questions, free free to email me as well!
